sourcesContent:
import { Container, Content, Row } from "./styles"
import Input from "./Components/Input";
import Button from "./Components/Button";



const App = () => {
  const [currentNumber, setCurrentNumber] = useState(0)
  
  
  return (
    <Container>
      <Content>
        <Input value={currentNumber}></Input>
        <Row>
          <Button label="x"></Button>
          <Button label="/"></Button>
          <Button label="c"></Button>
          <Button label="ce"></Button>
        </Row>
        <Row>
          <Button label="7"></Button>
          <Button label="8"></Button>
          <Button label="9"></Button>
          <Button label="-"></Button>
        </Row>
        <Row>
          <Button label="4"></Button>
          <Button label="5"></Button>
          <Button label="6"></Button>
          <Button label="+"></Button>
        </Row>
        <Row>
          <Button label="1"></Button>
          <Button label="2"></Button>
          <Button label="3"></Button>
          <Button label="="></Button>
        </Row>
        </Content>
    </Container>
  );
}

export default App;
